Ingredients.4: 3 small baking potatoes, peeled and sliced

Ingredients.5: 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup

Ingredients.6: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease a 2-quart baking dish.

Directions.2: Pour vegetable broth into a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Add TVP and remove from heat. Allow to soften.

Directions.3: Heat olive oil in a large, nonstick frying pan over medium-high heat. Saute potato slices in the hot oil just until golden, 5 to 7 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside until cool enough to handle.

Directions.4: While potatoes cool are cooling, add condensed soup, diced tomatoes, salsa, and chile peppers to the TVP.

Directions.5: Place a layer of potato slices in the prepared baking dish, followed by a layer of the TVP mixture; repeat until done. Top with Cheddar cheese.

Directions.6: Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until potatoes are tender and cheese is melted and golden, about 1 hour.
